instructions: From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Tap Wi-Fi . Touch and hold on the network you are connected to. Tap Forget network .

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Tap Wi-Fi . If necessary, tap the Wi-Fi switch to turn on Wi-Fi. Tap the Menu icon. Tap Scan . Select the Wi-Fi network you want to connect to. If security is enabled, enter the password. Tap CONNECT .
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Tap the Wi-Fi switch to the ON position to turn on. Tap the Wi-Fi switch to the OFF position to turn off.
